mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.company_name as "company_name", e.employment_title as "employment_title", e.employment_contents as "employment_contents", c.company_id as "company_id", e.hope_job FROM company c Join employments e ON c.company_id = e.company_id Join resume r ON e.hope_job = r.hope_job WHERE r.member_id = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
